title: ISO 8601-1:2019 Time Interval by Start and End (Ordinal Date, Basic Format)
description: A time interval identified by its start and end, using ordinal date combined with complete local time of day in basic format [YYYY][DDD]["T"][hh][mm][ss]["/"][YYYY][DDD]["T"][hh][mm][ss] (ยง5.5.3.4 a, ยง5.5.3.1 a)
